welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ninove, a charming city known for its beautiful historic buildings and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, used for international flights and equipped with modern amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport houses all necessary facilities for passengers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport caters to private and business aviation, providing luxurious amenities and services for a seamless travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the designated network and follow the prompts to access the internet.
